Posts.Content: My Sister Kim Hiltz is 32 years old and battling breast cancer.   Despite surgery, chemo, radiation, hormone treatment and drug therapy over the past four years, Kim’s cancer is aggressive and treatment options are limited. She could continue chemotherapy, but with questionable effectiveness over a short-term outlook. She is travelling to Texas for a stem cell transplant.  See her complete story and updatess on www.kimshope.com       Post Edited (KIMSHOPE) : 7/25/2005 9:12:50 PM (GMT-6)
Posts.Title: PLEASE READ AND PASS ON
